profile.about: I’m a passionate developer with 5+ years of experience building modern web applications. I specialize in creating responsive websites with a focus on performance and great UX. I’ve worked with clients from startups to established companies on various projects worldwide.

reviews.author: John Doe
reviews.comment: Sarah did an amazing job on our company’s website! Communication was great and delivery was fast.

reviews.author: Maria Lopez
reviews.comment: Great experience overall. Very talented and reliable freelancer. Highly recommend!
